ngoData.ngoBio: Udaar Foundation Non Government organisation (NGO) established on 16 Aug 2020 by Rishikant Mishra and his team. The committed organizers never realized that they would be effectively running a set up NGO, 'Udaar Foundation' spread across UP states. Udaar Foundation trusts and engages in giving all the assets to the penniless to help them so that they can make their own predetermination. We established this NGO due to the need of offering a chance to help the helpless kids, individuals and youth of India. We aim to diminish the destitution in India. Throughout the recent 2 years, Udaar Foundation has dealt with numerous tasks identified with mindfulness crusades like - Seminars on feminine wellbeing, women strengthening, sports, and women business venture which points toward aiding the oppressed part of the country. We have consistently believed that through development and grassroot endeavors, our youngsters can change this nation. Regardless of whether rich or poor, the cutting edge has the ability to change this world. The wide range of our exercises and their prosperity rate talk about committed work done by Udaar Foundation

ngoData.ngoCity: 506, FIFTH FLOOR , KRISHNA APRA BUSINESS SQUARE , NETA JI SUBHASH PLACE , PITAMPURA
ngoData.ngoBio: JAG KALYAN SEWA SANSTHA is a non-profit organization that is committed to making a positive impact in our community and beyond. Our organization has been working for the needy since 2018 and we are working in many sectors such as education, skill development, women's empowerment, healthcare, and providing basic necessities to the needy. We are also working in the environment and animal care sectors. Our mission is to reach out to the needy and ask about their needs, and provide them with basic necessities. We are driven by a team of dedicated and passionate individuals who believe in the power of collaboration and compassion to bring about meaningful change. We are grateful for the support of our donors, volunteers, and partners, and we strive to make the most of every opportunity to make a difference in the world.

ngoData.ngoCity: Unit 11, 18/2 Arya Samaj Road, Karol Bagh, New Delhi 110005
ngoData.ngoBio: We are a non-profit organization committed to creating a sustainable future for vulnerable communities worldwide. Our mission is to empower individuals, families and communities to build a better life for themselves and their loved ones by providing access to resources, education and economic opportunities. We work with communities to identify their needs and create programs that will have a lasting impact. Our programs focus on health, education, employment, social justice and environmental sustainability. We strive to create an environment of self-sufficiency, where individuals and communities can take control of their lives and create a better future for themselves and generations to come.

ngoData.ngoCauses: WOMEN EMPOWERMENT,  CHILD EDUCATION AND ENVIRONMENT CONSERVATION
ngoData.ngoCity: 212 FIRST FLOOR SHAHPUR JAT, NEW DELHI
ngoData.ngoBio: CHHALAANG FOUNDATION IS A NON PROFIT ORGANIZATION WORKING AT GRASSROOT LEVEL FOR  WOMEN EMPOWERMENT, LIVELIHOOD, EDUCATION AND HUNGER. IT AIMS AT EMPOWERING WOMEN BY CREATING VOCATIONAL CENTRES AND LIVELIHOOD PROGRAMMES FOR THEM, THE ORGANIZATION IS SIMULTANEOUSLY WORKING FOR ENVIRONMENT CONSERVATION BY LINKING LIVELIHOOD PROGRAMMES AND UPCYCLING OF WASTE IN THE SOCIETY.  IN 2 YEARS SINCE ITS INCEPTION, THE ORGANIZATION HAS IMPACTED 12,000+ LIVES THROUGH ON GROUND OPERATIONS IN DELHI- NCR REGION.

ngoData.ngoBio: Bhoomi is a non-governmental and non profitable organization registered in the Kumaun region of Uttrakhand in India. organization working in the field of Rural development since 11 October 2002. Bhoomi has effectively launched & completed several projects. we have worked closely with communities to improve their quality of life. Bhoomi Organization provide government and non government services to rural community.

ngoData.ngoName: GIRIJA BUTIQUE EVM MAHILA VIKAS SANSTHAN
ngoData.ngoCauses: Art & Culture,Food Processing,Environment & Forests,Micro Finance (SHGs),Micro Small & Medium Enterprises,Rural Development & Poverty Alleviation,Urban Development & Poverty Alleviation,Vocational Training,Women's Development & Empowerment
ngoData.ngoBio: Girija Boutique Evm Mahila Vikas Sanstha is a non-governmental & nonprofit organization registered in Uttrakhand under society Act 1860 Reg.No.254/2015-2016  dated 29/2/2016  in society registrar office Heera Nagar Haldwani Nainital. Our Organization has been working as a group for the last 14 years and since then, has trained 6000 women till date. After Society registration till date women have been trained in Stitching, Weaving, Mehandi, Beautician, Appan, Painting, Candle, Incense Stick etc. and have provide employment to them. We have good infrastructure and expert manpower to conducting an implementing training program anywhere in uttarakhand.  they can start their own enterprise. We conduct many awareness programmes to implement.

ROSNI (Rehabilitation of Social & Neurological Impaired) SOCIETY is an organization of parents, caretakers & well wishers of persons with disability (PwIDDs) It was started as first parents organization in Haldwani ( Kumaon) in the year 2011. This group of people work together to nurture the individual efforts and with passage of time developed into a structured and formal organization.
